snippet: Rob Astorino, the Westchester County executive, is a social conservative with little state name recognition and a small campaign budget. Still, he is enthusiastic about his chances of upsetting Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo in November’s election.
abstract: Westchester County executive Rob Astorino, Republican nominee for New York State gubernatorial election, says he likes his chances of upsetting Gov Andrew M Cuomo; Astorino is social conservative with little-known name and small campaign budget, but insists he is no stranger to long odds.
lead_paragraph: Rob Astorino, the Westchester County executive, is a social conservative with little state name recognition and a small campaign budget. Still, he is enthusiastic about his chances of upsetting Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo in November’s election.

headline.main: Astorino, Cuomo’s Opponent, Wants Voters to Know the Race Isn’t Over
headline.print_headline: Astorino Wants Voters to Know Race Isn’t Over
